attributes.action: Scrap the implementation of UK trials without a jury
attributes.additional_details: By preventing a jury sitting on trials this could result in unfair or over excessive judgment. Humans deserve the right to a fair trial.
attributes.background: To NEVER implement court trials without a jury. Everyone on trial deserve a fair trial and with fairness comes a jury panel.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
